Package g58990.chess.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
g58990.chess.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Model
public class Game extends Object implements Model
Represents a game. A game has a board, 2 colors, and once the game has started, a game has a current player.
Author:
jp

    • isCurrentPlayerPosition

      public boolean isCurrentPlayerPosition(Position pos)
      Check if the square at the given position is occupied by a piece of the current player.
      Specified by:
      isCurrentPlayerPosition in interface Model
      Parameters:
      pos - the postion
      Returns:
      true if the position is occupied by a piece of the current player, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the position is not located on the board.

    • movePiecePosition

      public void movePiecePosition(Position oldPos, Position newPos)
      Moves a piece from one position of the chess board to another one. If the game is not over, change the current player.
      Specified by:
      movePiecePosition in interface Model
      Parameters:
      oldPos - the current position
      newPos - the new position of the board where to put the piece
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if 1) oldPos or newPos are not located on the board, or 2) oldPos does not contain a piece, or 3) the piece does not belong to the current player, or 4) the move is not valid for the piece located at position oldPos

      Check if the game is over or not

      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise.
